title: American Horror Story: Cult | Season 7 Ep. 5: Follow the Leader Scene | FX
author: FX Networks
comment:
Me, sarcastically, as I watch the first episode: I bet Ivy is totally in on it. 
Me, watching the fifth episode: Oh, damn. Guess I jokingly called it?

Kai: *smacks the guy 
Guy: oh yes harder Daddy!!😫😫
I feel like Winters is connected to the Coven somehow.. She just gives me coven vibes

I feel like we're being lulled by the obvious and then BAM, some major twists are gonna appear.
Maybe Kai sacrificing them, which like The Family they'll just take it, so he can put them away - he's said he'd bring them to justice - and gain a more broad, generalized following.

Beverly:The world isn’t tell me it’s show me
Me:So true
description:
Never challenge the leader. See how Kai reacts in this selected scene from American Horror Story: Cult.
